articles.author: Eric Revell
articles.title: Buffett explains Berkshire's reduced stake in Apple at annual company meeting - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Warren Buffett discussed Berkshire Hathaway's decision to reduce its stake in tech giant Apple at Berkshire's annual meeting on Saturday in Omaha, Nebraska.
articles.content:
Warren Buffett
, the billionaire co-founder and CEO of Berkshire Hathaway, offered some insights Saturday at the company's annual meeting into the decision to reduce its stake in tech giant Apple, w… [+4104 chars]
